message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm looking for a quick sale. How about $20,000?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $13,500 is cutting it pretty close to my bottom line.  How about we split the difference and call it $14,250?
I understand your position, but $14,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.
